title: [Chinese Language][Martial Arts] Taiji Pushing Hands
description:
[Chinese Language][Martial Arts] Taiji Pushing Hands
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  brought to you by DaoBan

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Content:

Introduction---From the cover:

"Chen style Taichi hand pushing hands is also called &#039;enduring hand&#039; whereby hardness and external strength is overcome by gentleness and yielding.  It is a unique two person method of practicing.  Your rival connects with you through circling, winding and adherence to a set technique, combining moves of connecting, leaning, bending and holding which develops the co-ordination of the internal and external strengths of the body.  

For improving Taichi skill and learning to adapat to changing moves, practicing pushing hands is crucial.  If you don&#039;t have adequate Taichi quan skill, your rival will feel your weakness during the pushing hands movements.  There are five kinds of pushing hands forms in Chen style Taichi:  Single hand pushing, double hand pushing, natural hand pushing, stroking hand pushing and florist hand pushing (picking flowers without rule).

Specific---

The title of this torrent is NOT a typo.  "Taiji" is what the cover says, so thats what I am using here, even if its a typo on their part.

Video begins with an introduction to the Chen family style of Taichi
- In Chinese, w/Chinese Subtitles
- Followed by English w/ English Subtitles

At approximately 8m47s, the actual lesson begins...
-Lesson is in Chinese and English
-As is typical for this type of video, the moves are shown, then shown again

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes on the files:
